main event: A military report from Luke AFB, Arizona detailed the observation of an unidentified aerial object on December 15, 1954.
interesting points: The observation lasted for 15-20 seconds., The object was reported to have a northward course., The conclusion of the report indicated satellite decay as the cause of the observation., A second document noted the appearance of a bright white light with a tail, resembling a meteorite., The object was observed at an altitude of approximately 19,233 feet.
